message: I'm still trying to wrap my head around the situation when I hear footsteps at the entrance to the alley.

name: ウイルス
message: "Well, if it isn't Aoba. Fancy meeting you here."

name: トリップ
message: "Yoohoo, Aoba!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You guys..."
It's Virus and Trip.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you doing here?"

name: ウイルス
message: "This area is under our protection."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Yakuza?"
Koujaku's eyes narrow.
For a Ribsteez like Koujaku, a pair of yakuza walking around like they own the place isn't a pleasant sight.

name: 紅雀
message: "You guys twins? You're even dressed alike."

name: ウイルス
message: "We're not twins."

name: 紅雀
message: "...You hang with yakuza now?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I wouldn't say that... They weren't even yakuza when I met them. Back around the time you left the island."

name: ウイルス
message: "Yes, you could say we're old chums."

name: トリップ
message: "Yeah, nothin' to do with work."

name: ウイルス
message: "Some of our colleagues may be less than courteous, but we take care never to violate the rules. It's bad for business. I hope you understand."

name: 紅雀
message: "A yakuza's a yakuza. There aren't any good ones. Once you stoop to that level, it stains you. It's in your blood. I can smell it."
Virus and Trip exchange glances.
Honestly, I'm surprised too by the rage in Koujaku's voice. Has he always had such an intense hatred of yakuza?

name: ウイルス
message: "But on this island, there's hardly any difference between the yakuza and the police. You know that, don't you?"

name: ウイルス
message: "Correct me if I'm wrong, but you're the head of one of these gangs, aren't you? Surely, you must be on friendly terms with more than a few officers of the law."

name: 紅雀
message: "It's not like all police are bad. Some can be pretty chill."

name: ウイルス
message: "Then I hope you can see that we're the same. That we, despite being yakuza, are 'chill.'"

name: トリップ
message: "Haha!"

name: ウイルス
message: "By the way, Aoba, wasn't Dry Juice your friend's gang? Have they moved to another area?"

name: トリップ
message: "We haven't seen 'em around."

name: 蒼葉
message: "They're... gone."

name: ウイルス
message: "Gone?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "We just got here too. Someone painted over all the Dry Juice tags... and replaced them with Morphine's."

name: ウイルス
message: "Morphine..."
Virus rubs his chin thoughtfully.

name: トリップ
message: "Morphine? Aren't they like some kinda boogeyman?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. I figured someone might be trying to make it look like Morphine did it, but..."

name: ウイルス
message: "Either way, what a barbaric thing to do, taking out an entire gang. How... distasteful."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You said this area was under your protection. Don't you know anything?"

name: ウイルス
message: "Yes, this is our territory. As for what we know..."

name: トリップ
message: "It wasn't like this last night."

name: ウイルス
message: "Though we didn't see any Dry Juice members then, either."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What time was that about?"

name: トリップ
message: "Around nine, I think? Must've happened after that."

name: ウイルス
message: "Perhaps... but kidnapping such a large number of people is no simple task."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I know that. So..."
...maybe Morphine really did take them all, just like in the stories.
But I don't dare say that out loud.

name: ウイルス
message: "Alright. We'll be sure to let you know if we find anything."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks."

name: ウイルス
message: "Still, you should be careful. Things have been... dangerous lately, as this latest incident illustrates."

name: トリップ
message: "There's a lot we don't know about. Can't keep up with everything."

name: 紅雀
message: "Rib's just another source of income for you assholes. You don't give a damn about us!"
Koujaku spits on the ground. Virus lifts an eyebrow, amused.

name: ウイルス
message: "We understand that our livelihood depends on this city, which is precisely why it's so important to have a solid foundation."

name: ウイルス
message: "Whether this truly is the work of Morphine matters little. When someone causes trouble in your territory... you deal with it. Am I wrong?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Tch."
Koujaku looks away.

name: ウイルス
message: "If you'll excuse us. We'd like to make a more thorough inspection of the... Hm?"
